Standard Icons

Strathmroe is design inspired by a pad of paper in the hand. Subtle Textures and Layer shadows keep the readablity very high.
A beuatiful slab font that shows a complexity and texture to the fonts used in the design.

sections.description:
Can I Use Markdown

Highly sturctured Combination of components to make a functional streamlined and consistent experiance when asking for information.
Structured containers to bring content and ui together.
Single Class that controls single styles allowing for quick manipulations and when combined can style new types of UI without the need of new CSS.
Depends on base border module in _borders.css

sections.description:
This is not part of the style of Strathmore

This is a collection of documentation types that can be used as templates when doecuemting the Styles of Strathmore. It is all based off of the "SC5"
This is how you define a container
This is how templates can stack inside of other templates
This is how templates can stack inside of other templates

section.description:
Can I Use Markdown

Highly sturctured Combination of components to make a functional streamlined and consistent experiance when asking for information.
Structured containers to bring content and ui together.
Single Class that controls single styles allowing for quick manipulations and when combined can style new types of UI without the need of new CSS.
Depends on base border module in _borders.css

This is not part of the style of Strathmore

This is how templates can stack inside of other templates
